Latest: 除此之外，我有一条出于私心的请求。
English: In addition to this, I have a selfish request.

Latest: 在叙拉古的森林之中，我遇到了一位独臂的沃尔珀少女。
English: In the forests of Syracuse I met a one-armed Vulpus maiden.

Latest: 她沉溺在对过去的复仇之中，拘泥于那片染血的土地。
English: She was obsessed with revenge for the past, clinging to that bloodsoaked land.

Latest: 出于怜悯，我帮助了她，也许这伤害到了她的自尊，但她倔强的求生方式的确感动了我。
English: Out of pity, I helped her. Maybe it hurt her self-esteem, but her stubborn way of survival really touched me.

Latest: 后来我意识到，我一时兴起的援助，不过是坚定了她复仇的执念，这让我寝食难安。
English: Then I realized that my impulse to help had only solidified her obsession with revenge, I couldn't sleep when I realized what I've done.

Latest: 所以我想把我的一切赠送给她，尽管我几乎一无所有，只剩那么点可悲的遗物。
English: So I wanted to give her everything I had, even though I had almost nothing but a few sad momentos.

Latest: ——恕我打断一下，您的亲属列表里没有沃尔珀人。这会为我们的工作带来很多麻烦。
English: ——With all due respect, there are no Vulpus listed on your list of relatives. This will bring a lot of trouble to our work.

Latest: 所以，这只是一位膝下无子的拉特兰公民，在将死之际向公证所提出的小小请求。
English: That's why this is a small request from a childless citizen of Laterano to a notary on my deathbed.

Name: Executor
Latest: 我已经解除了陷阱，请跟上。
English: I've cleared the trap. Follow me.

Name: Vermeil
Latest: 啊啊——你这个怪人，我迟早要让你好看——！
English: Arghhhh——you weirdo, I'll get you sooner or later——!

Latest: 请一定要照顾好她，送葬人先生。当然，也许对你而言也是一件好事。
English: Please take care of her, Mr. Executor. Of course, maybe it will be a good thing for you, too.

Latest: 别摆出一副不理解的表情，你会明白的。
English: Don't look like you don't understand. You'll understand someday.

Latest: 希望你们能让她脱离泥泞。别让她像我一样。
English: I hope you can get her out of that place. Don't let her end up like me.

Latest: 正义？也许我的所作所为是有正当性的吧，先生，如果公证所能够谅解我的话。
English: Justice? Perhaps I have done right, Sir, if the notary will excuse me.

Latest: 但那依旧不是什么值得称赞的事情，相反，正因如此，才让人生显得荒谬之极。
English: But that's still not a laudable thing. On the contrary, it's what makes life seem ridiculous.

Latest: 但她是我的遗产。
English: But she's my legacy.

Latest: 是我的希望。
English: She is my hope.

Latest: 愿主保佑。
English: God bless.

Latest: ......每个刽子手都这么说的。但最后，总是见血。
English: ... That's what every killer says. But in the end, there's always bloodshed.

Latest: 你是什么人？\
English: Who are you? \

Latest: 哼......你知道的很清楚。
English: Humph... You do know about it.
